events.name: CampaignCreated
events.description: Initiate a new marketing campaign for product promotion.

events.name: CampaignLaunched
events.description: Execute the planned marketing activities of a campaign.

events.name: CampaignCompleted
events.description: Mark the campaign as completed and analyze results.

events.name: AdCreated
events.description: Create a new advertisement for the campaign.

events.name: AdScheduled
events.description: Schedule the ad to run at specified times.

events.name: AdEvaluated
events.description: Evaluate the performance of the ad after it runs.

events.name: MarketResearchConducted
events.description: Conduct research to understand target audience and market trends.

events.name: SegmentCreated
events.description: Create a new customer segment based on market research.

commands.name: CreateCampaign

commands.description: Execute the planned marketing activities of a campaign.

commands.name: ScheduleAd
